title: [Go Igo Baduk Weiqi] [mafutrct] [2010.08.12] Book Collection
description:
Welcome!

This is one of the biggest collections of go related material that can be found on the net currently. I (mafutrct) compiled and extended it with the help of others over the past 3 years. Back then, finding go books was quite hard, and it took a lot of effort to get not only the few public books but also the more extensive pile on private ftps and such. Since IÃŽâ€œÃŽâ€œÃƒÂ©Ã‚Â¼ÃŽâ€œÃƒÂ¤ÃƒÂ³m a totally nice person I decided to collect, sort and publish this pile for all of you.

If I didn't miscount, this is the third incarnation of Mafutrct's Go Book Collection. We're up to about 4.6 gb, from 800 and 900 mb before. As a major change, I included the Go World archive and books in other languages as well. I hope it is useful for some of you.

The heap of material waiting to be sorted and added keeps growing, so sorry, this is not everything I have right now, but you can expect me to add it next time ÃŽâ€œÃŽâ€œÃƒÂ©Ã‚Â¼ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Â£ probably next year. Despite this, I do encourage you to send me new material, so the torrent keeps growing and prospering for many years, being a helpful resource for all Go players that canÃŽâ€œÃŽâ€œÃƒÂ©Ã‚Â¼ÃŽâ€œÃƒÂ¤ÃƒÂ³t afford to buy books, or keeping books alive that are discontinued.

IÃŽâ€œÃŽâ€œÃƒÂ©Ã‚Â¼ÃŽâ€œÃƒÂ¤ÃƒÂ³m doing this for free, obviously, and I do in no way earn any money by this, so please donÃŽâ€œÃŽâ€œÃƒÂ©Ã‚Â¼ÃŽâ€œÃƒÂ¤ÃƒÂ³t sue me. If you hold rights on one of the included books and you want it removed, please drop me a message. Contact details are at the end. But please notice that this is also a way of free advertisement, and as for me, I do buy books that I enjoyed to support the author. And I believe that many people do so as well. A huge deal of what I bought was acquired and tried in a legally questionably way before, and would never have been bought, nor recommended to friends, if that way did not exist.

I would like to thank those who contributed material, but as I refrain from listing names you know who you are. Thanks, guys!

So, again, I hope this is useful for some of you. Seeding would be appreciated since my pipe is smallband. Have fun!

mafutrct
